name: New-Project-Starter-Kit
title: New Project Starter Kit
description: Start new projects with Eleventy, webpack, Babel, StandardJS, Sass, PostCSS, PWA, service workers, and Netlify CMS installed and configured, with some common accessible HTML, CSS, and JS components and patterns. Includes deployment configuration for Netlify and Zeit Now. This starter kit is open source and completely free. Use it however you like.

scripts.test: npm run standard:fix && npm run debug
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist & npm run clean:js & npm run clean:css & npm run clean:fonts & npm run clean:img
scripts.clean:dist: if [ -d dist ]; then echo './dist exists' & rm -R dist && echo './dist was removed'; fi
scripts.clean:js: if [ -d src/js ]; then echo './src/js exists' & rm -R src/js && echo './src/js was removed'; fi
scripts.clean:css: if [ -d src/css ]; then echo './src/css exists' & rm -R src/css && echo './src/css was removed'; fi
scripts.clean:fonts: if [ -d src/fonts ]; then echo './src/fonts exists' & rm -R src/fonts && echo './src/fonts was removed'; fi
scripts.clean:img: if [ -d src/img ]; then echo './src/img exists' & rm -R src/img && echo './src/img was removed'; fi
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run webpack
